帨字的基本解释

帨
shuì
佩巾：“无感（撼）我帨兮。”
用巾擦手：“皇帝帨手取觯。”
蒙，覆盖。

帨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuì］
［《廣韻》舒芮切，去祭，書。］
［《廣韻》此芮切，去祭，清。］
(1)佩巾。古代女子出嫁时，母亲所授。用以擦拭不洁。在家时挂在门右，外出时系在身左。
(2)泛指巾帕。
(3)拭擦。
(4)蒙，覆盖。

帨字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　帨； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页331第23
【廣韻】舒芮切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】輸芮切，?音稅。【玉篇】帨，巾也。【儀禮·士昏禮】母施衿結帨。【註】帨，佩巾也。【禮·內則】女子設帨于門右。【註】帨，事人之佩巾也。　又【集韻】此芮切，音毳。又須銳切，音歲。又【類篇】欲雪切，音悅。義?同。

考證：〔【儀禮·士昏禮】毋施衿結帨。〕　謹照原文毋改母。

handkerchief
Basic explanation of words
handkerchief
shuì
Wearing a towel: "No sense (shock) I'm pretty."
Wiping his hands with a towel: "The emperor takes a hand and takes a scull."
Mongolian, covered.
handkerchief
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shuì］
["Guangyun" Shu Ruiqie, go to sacrifice, book. ]
["Guangyun" This Ruiqie, go to sacrifice, Qing. ]
(1) Wear towel. When an ancient woman got married, her mother gave it to her. Used to wipe dirty. Hang on the right side of the door when you are at home, and on your left when you go out.
(2) Refers to the towel.
(3) Wipe.
(4) Meng, cover.
handkerchief
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　帨; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 331 23
[Guang Yun] Shu Ruiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Losing Ruiqie, the sound tax. [Jade articles] 帨, towel also. 【Rituals·Shiyun Li】Mother Shi Yunjie. [Note] I wear a towel. [Li·Nei Ze] The woman is set at the right of the door. [Note] Buddhism is also a scarf for people.　[Jiyun] This Ruiqie is sound. It must be sharp, sound-year-old. Also 【Classes】I want to snow and cut, and Yinyue. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Ritual Ceremony·Shihunli] No Shi Yunjie. 〕 　 I would like not to change the mother according to the original text.
